title: Ten - The Dragon And Saint George [EP]2015 ak
description:
The Dragon And Saint George is the fifth EP by the Melodic Hard rock band Ten which was released on the 4th of September 2015.As with the previous two albums, the cover of the EP was illustrated by Gaetano Di Falco. It is the first EP release for the band since 1999's Fear the Force EP and also the first to be released on 12 format.

Contents

    2 Personnel
